title: A guide to the accusations against Abercrombie & Fitch ex-CEO Mike Jeffries
description: The retailer says it's investigating claims that its ex-CEO sexually exploited young men at lavish parties. It's a major test for a brand that's remaking its image for a socially conscious era.

title: New Delhi police launch fresh raids on Indian journalists
description: Critics said Tuesday's raids on NewsClick offices and journalists have targeted one of India's few remaining independent news outlets. NewsClick is under investigation for alleged funding from China.
